summary:
Temple Plate Armor
You can create and strenthen this armor at any forge
Every item properties are same as Steel Plate Armor
The helmet is empty mesh so that you can have complete armor perk.
descriptionHtml:
Hentai\'s Temple Plate Armor


release date : January 2012
Category: Armor
Armor rating : Heavy armor
Mod version : 1.0
Author: Hentai


Description
===========
Temple Plate Armor
You can create and strenthen this armor at any forge
Every item properties are same as Steel Plate Armor
The helmet is empty mesh so that you can have complete armor perk.



Install
=======
Extract the archive. Take the folders \"meshes\", \"textures\" and paste them in your Skyrim/Data folder. 
Check the esp file on skyrim launcher menu


Uninstall
=========
Delete Folder
Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\armor\\Hentai\\TemplePlate
Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\nordplate


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games.


Tools Used
==========
Blender
NIFSkope
Photoshop


Permissions 
==========
1. Do not upload this file on Steam Workshop until furthur notice. ( I like Nexus so much more as a modder)
2.  Feel free to use everything in this file.
3.  Everything I made for Obliviion is free to convert to Skyrim. Since Im not going to convert them myself.
author: Hentai
